short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to make StackOverflow and Github resizable

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The purpose of this application is to make StackOverflow and Github Responsive. It currently only resizes the page. If anyone would like to contribute to the open-source application they can push to https://github.com/yossi-ruben/StackOverflow-and-Github-Responsive .
